details.purpose: Divides a matrix of test cases into subsets for parallel execution
notes: The script processes a file named 'matrix' and creates multiple 'matrix?' files containing subsets of tests.
It uses predefined variables (maxlist1, maxlist2, maxlist3) to define the number of tests per subset.
The script separates tests based on their type (MPI, OMP, serial, etc.) and uses 'split' command to divide them into subsets.
